::Epyon::

He listened to this FZ, and Angel Prime. This Zardus made him sick.
If the bot wasn't willing to fight in one on one combat like a true
warrior. To fight for his and his troops honor, the he wasn't worthy of
being a commander. Or even calling himself a Transformer!
